extendedInfo.description: Family Wall is the easiest way to share all that matters securely and privately with your family.It's totally free, and it works on most of the smartphones Iphone, Android, Windows...On Family Wall, you can easily catch up with your family, know there where they are, send messages to one or many family members, organize family event or just share important contacts like the baby-sitters, coach.... Family Wall is a private space with your family and only your family.FEATURES-----------------Family WallIn the wall you can browse all activities and interactions among family members. All records (post, location check-in, photo upload, Events and contacts) are logged sorted by date through a time-lined representation. Wall section view is also sorted by family members by selecting one member of the family.Family Calendar & ListsA centralized family calendar managed right from your phone. Add an appointment so everyone in the family can see it and no one misses the soccer practice or other important event.Create lists and assign To-Dos to family members such shopping lists or Groceries.Family PhotoShare easily your best photos with your family. You can browze the photos directly in the family Gallery or see new photos posted by the other members. Family LocatorFamily members can look at the location the different members based on the last location information sent by each member. The location can be a volatile information sent by the GPS of your phone (e.g. address, city, country) or a Family Point of Interest which can edited by each member of the family.Family MessagingUsing Family Messaging, a member can directly post a short message to the family members who will directly notified of the message. Each member will be able to browse the conversation using a thread view and easily participate to the conversation. Family ContactThe Family contact directory enables the member to rapidly find a useful contact of the family. The first being the family members, any member can add a contact with its details (e.g. Babysitter, grand parentsâ¦)A Contact of the directory can also be linked to Point of Interest as well as an event (typically a birthday, a party â¦).Enjoy!Team Family WallNOTE: If you experience any problems with your Family Wall app, please don't hesitate to CONTACT US directly at support@familyandco.com.You can also find us on Twitter (@familywall)

reviews.title: Needs a widget
reviews.comment: All types calendar,  task,  even news feed. All in all great app for immediate family!
reviews.author: Dat Nguyen

reviews.title: Very nice and handy app
reviews.comment: This is a very nicely designed app. Very helpful for the entire family. It would be nice to have a tablet version of this app. The web login also needs a little more work to have all the same functionality as the app.
reviews.author: Josh Morris

reviews.title: Great for non fb members
reviews.comment: I\'ve got several family members that are either anti-FB or are too young for FB. This app is perfect for all of us to share events happening in our lives and photos. The \"social\" aspect is great too; being able to see each other\'s comments (which is not always possible via text messaging).
reviews.author: Chameen Stratton

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: I\'m really nice features. I love the social aspect for a family unit... however more family roles should be defined. Unknown really?? Granted this can be changed inside the app, but that\'s kind of insulting.  There\'s no reason this app should not run in landscape mode.. make it 10 inch tablet friendly.  The calendar options okay, but can definitely be expanded. I\'m not really bothered by the checking status updates, as that would more than likely use the phone data plan.  All around this is a nice app.
reviews.author: Kiffany Bethel

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I love this app. Its perfect for sharing pics with family and knowing what their schedules are. It\'s a great way to keep in touch. :)
reviews.author: Stacey Conley

reviews.title: Beautiful,  with some bugs
reviews.comment: It looks great on the android, it has a nice an logical design, but it is a bit slow and has some bugs with the calendar (birthdays jump one day back at every profile update) Hope to see this one last.
reviews.author: ARPAD ANDRASSY

reviews.title: Extraordinary
reviews.comment: I would like to add list items more quickly, though. A grocery list doesn\'t need a lot of settings, for example.  In fact, groceries lists could be some sort of sub item list. This way, we could add grocery items just by entering the name and hitting feed line. And these sub items should be checkable without going to the completed list.  I think some emoticons, smiles or whatever would also bring a bit of life to the messages. Not everyone gets what ^^ means...
reviews.author: Ricardo Cardoso

reviews.title: Has potential
reviews.comment: When you can choose to turn on and off the family map to allow privacy betweens family members I will reinstall
reviews.author: Felicia Kriloff

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Great app! would love to see a widget and would love to be able to delete photos within the gallery without removing them on the wall and vice versa. Still no less than 5 stars is deserved regardless and looking forward to future updates.
reviews.author: Roman Petrillo

reviews.title: Samsung Note 2
reviews.comment: if i could bulk upload photos and videos i would give more stars.
reviews.author: Nathan J Brewster

reviews.title: Switching from life 360?
reviews.comment: I have both aps and am curious to see how this one improves so I can delete 360. A widget and constant tracking would be the greatest.
reviews.author: Kristin Taylor

reviews.title: A widget would earn 5 stars
reviews.comment: Very good, loads of potential but should have a widget as standard.
reviews.author: Chris Bassett

reviews.title: Excellent app but widget needed
reviews.comment: Love this app. By far the easiest to use. Coordinating the family\'s activities has never been easier.  Please please please bring out a widget. Would happily pay for the privilege of a widget.
reviews.author: Sonia Ellul

reviews.title: Automatically Check-In?
reviews.comment: Overall the Family Wall app is good. We are paid subscribers, but we would like to see automatic check-in. Checking in is one of the main features we use the app. We have to decide on keeping this app or staying with Life360 -- they have auto check-in but no wall to post messages and photos.
reviews.author: Gener IcDefault

reviews.title: Great app, but...
reviews.comment: I really like how this app is designed and it has almost all the features I was looking for except constant location tracking. But sometimes the wording is not correct and after this last up date it loops at the opening screen so it\'s unusable now. I have an Xperia Z. I hope to see it progress in the future.
reviews.author: Tracy Le Blanc

reviews.title: Great job
reviews.comment: It is the best apps&sites over the all social sites. .   Hence i give it 5*
reviews.author: Jamil Sarwer
